column5: Hey everyone! I'm a first time user on this site and must say WoW, I'm impressed with the way this site works! I've used other fishing forums, but this one is my first choice now. Well I'm going to Pigeon Lake this week and wondering if any one can give some hints, or even upload a map that i could go by? I'm searching for my first muskie, so than i can change my profile picture. LOL! Some help would be great!
Welcome aboard!  Good luck on getting your first muskie!
Look for points, weed bed edges, anything that a predator can use for cover to ambush baitfish. Oh and cast at least 10,000 times Good luck!

Hey bro glad you found yur way on board the #1 fishin board, now lets see if we can get ya some trips in and nail some fishies. We all like posts with lots of pics, so don't be afraid to go trigger happy on the camera...lol. talk at ya at work.
Well come to the board hope you have a great experience here.
Welcome aboard. Never caught one myself but good luck to you!
all i'm going to do that this weekend is cast bucktails. I'm there for 3 days, somethings got to go for it!
Welcome to OFC dizzidevil Good luck on your hunt for ski's  Leechman
Welcome aboard!! lets us know how you make out...
does any one have a map of the lake that they can upload of the lake with good muskie spots to go to?

Good luck on getting your first. Fish shallow with those bucktails and you should be rewarded eventually. Don't skimp on speed either.. crank em as fast as you can.  Maybe this map will help you out.  http://fish-hawk.net/hawktalk/viewtopic.php?t=130
